{"id":1212109212,"question_id":3349,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1711247622,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1212109212/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Length Substring With Two Occurrences","memory":"42.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maximumLengthSubstring(String s) {\n        \n        int res = 0;\n        \n        int[]arr = new int[26];\n        \n        int st = 0;\n        for(int ed=0; ed<s.length(); ed++){\n            \n            char ch = s.charAt(ed);\n            arr[ch-'a']++;\n            while(arr[ch-'a']>2){\n                char chh = s.charAt(st);\n                arr[chh-'a']--;\n                st++;\n            }\n            \n            res = Math.max(res, ed-st+1);\n            \n        }\n        \n        return res;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-length-substring-with-two-occurrences","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
